name: The tendie escape principle
description:
A sadistic incel traps you in his dungeon...which suspiciously resembles his mom's basement. The only obstacle more harrowing than restricted movement, lava floors, and roaming Chads is your captor's awful personality.

A game by:
Bram: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCczi7Aq_dTKrQPF5ZV5J3gg?view_as=subscriber
Sam: https://twitter.com/SamLeCornu_
Xavier: https://www.instagram.com/xavier.muth/
